# Send Test Email

# Description

Send test email to a list of contacts.

# Project compatibility

Windows | Cross-platform

# Configuration

* 
* Campaign ID - Enter a campaign name to associate the campaign to this email, or enter a campaign ID. This field supports String type input.
* Emails - One or more emails in a comma-separated format to add to the list. You can send a maximum of 50 emails per day. This field supports String type input.





* Test Email Status - Indicates the current status of the test email being sent. Automatically generated output variable.
